items.label: 539fb70eec4f024bc1dc076d
items.description:
Available for residential and seasonal service for domestic use qualifying as "Residential Load" as defined in the Pacific Northwest Electric Power Planning and Conservation Act, P.L.96-501.  Generally described as all usual residential, apartment, seasonal dwellings and farm electric loads or uses.  Any electric use by consumers, which does not so qualify, shall be served under other appropriate rate schedules of the District.  Subject to the District's established rules and regulations.

Seasonal service is defined as casual or periodic usage of five months or less annually.  Customers taking such service will prepay annually a charge equal to 12 times the above monthly Basic Charge.  A Seasonal Customer may request disconnect of service at any time. If a Seasonal Account is disconnected mid-year, any unused pre-paid Basic Charges will be refunded after any electrical usage has been calculated and charged.
items.name: Residential Schedule 100 - Three Phase
